content: I want to use the Cliical Query language for the eCQM , I saw documentation that there is CQM format which i can use to measure, But how and in which format i need to expose the data for this eCQL
There is a special #cql stream. Can you please ask your question there?
Should "point" be in the list of keywords in the CQL grammar, as it is used in the point from Interval[] operator?
